title: Ouster try nothing but revenge
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

Our current society is the prime example of self-destruction, as predicted by late Soviet Premier Nikita Khrushchev, who is rumored to have said: “We do not have to invade the United States. We will destroy you from within.”

Nov. 8, 2016, was a rude shock to the interested parties that had already crowned Hillary Clinton 45th president. And why should they not have? All the polls had given Mrs. Clinton the win as well. The anti-Trumpers emerged immediately to contest Mr. Trump’s victory; this was not supposed to have happened. There had been so much effort made to eliminate the possibility. So the anti-Trumpers came to a quick decision: We can’t fail twice. We must create a means to have him removed from office.

This removal attempt has been ongoing for nearly three years now. Well, guess what? Those planners who acted on the insurance policy are about to get a rude awakening. Stay tuned, America. The truth is coming. God bless our country and our president.

ALAN CRIBB

Tucker, Ga.
